message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.CV

The paper discusses the design of an HRI game scenario that involves emotional expressions and modeling affective interactions using artificial intelligence in autonomous robots. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Robotics (cs.RO), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Computer Vision (cs.CV). However, given the focus on designing an HRI game scenario, cs.HC is the most likely sub-category. The use of AI and robotics also suggests cs.AI and cs.RO as likely sub-categories. The mention of modeling affective interactions suggests cs.LG as a possible sub-category, while the use of emotional expressions suggests cs.CV as another possible sub-category.
